txt.en: The Elves at the way-post atop Amon Angeled provide supplies and provisions for the main force of the Malledhrim in the east.

'At Fállug, our scouts have encountered a vicious Warg, who stalked them all the way back to our encampments. This creature is a threat to those of us who continue to patrol the wilds of Southern Mirkwood.

'Travel to Fállug, if you would, [placeholder], and put an end to this beast. For such a deed, you will receive what reward I may offer.

'Hurry, [placeholder]! We cannot allow this Warg to continue harrying our scouts.'
Agonglok may be found around the ruins of Fállug, west of Amon Angeled.\n\nThindiel has asked you to defeat the Warg Agonglok.
'Agonglok has been defeated? That is a relief, [placeholder]. You have well-earned this reward.'
Thindiel is at the way-post atop Amon Angeled, east of Fállug.\n\nYou should bring news of your victory against Agonglok to Thindiel.
'You may find Agonglok in the ruins of Fállug to the west.'
'Thank you for your assistance, [placeholder]... though we still must find more arrows.'
'Our scouts patrol more freely, now that Agonglok is no more.'
Talk to Thindiel atop Amon Angened
